alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:01PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with heavy rain will impact portions of north central Ashe and southwestern Grayson Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 100 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm developing over Nella, or near Lansing. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain will produce low lying flooding and ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Nella... Rugby... Grassy Creek... Grayson Highlands State Park... Volney... and Shatley Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
